content: Head into the next area, and look left at the top of the stairs to find another Turtle General statue with a **Treasure Chest** with a Knot of Voidness and other materials, surrounded on all sides by praying Censor Holders.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Head into the next area, and look left at the top of the stairs to find another Turtle General statue with a **Treasure Chest** with a Knot of Voidness and other materials, surrounded on all sides by praying Censor Holders.
